title: Popup Image Downloader
checkboxLabel: Is it first photo of that post? (Checked: Yes, Unchecked: No) This feature is added because there may be multiple photos in the post and the code works differently after 1st photo.
notEnoughImages: Not enough images on the page.
warningText: Warning: Please open the post by refreshing the page, not by opening it in modal. This issue will be addressed in a future update. The confirmation box for the first photo question will be removed and the program will automatically perform this function.
